item.title: Why do interest rates continue to grind lower?
item.description: Many people have asked me recently why interest rates continue to grind lower. As can be seen in Figure 1 below, when viewed over the course of 3 decades, interest rates have declined almost linearly since 1982. In fact, the same trend holds true for many western countries.
